response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Considering its high quality and functionality, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $140 for you. This offer is exclusive and tailored to appreciate your interest and commitment.
